posts.post_title: T209 Color Series and a T51-ALL SOLD!!!
posts.post_content:
I have a few cards from the scarce T209 first series for sale.

T209 Lane - sold (only four graded higher by PSA)
T209 Crockett - sold
T209 Gilmore - sold


T51 Ohio State - sold
PayPal friends and family (no fee), check or money order accepted. Prices include shipping. Sorry for the pics, I'm having issues with my scanner. PM or email at [url]feeshuntin@gmail.com[/url] Thanks -Marshall
